website_summaries.verdict: This model provides an exceptionally close and comfortable shave, and includes a useful click-on beard styler with adjustable settings.
pros: This razor earns its distinction as one of Philips top-end models
The powerful motor gives a shave comparable to manual blades without irritating the skin
The beard styler is simple to attach, and can be adjusted to five different settings
Offers users a lot of flexibility in getting the look they want
cons: Some users report the shave heads on this model wear down more quickly than on some similar models

customer_reviews.title: This is a grossly overpriced, poor performing shaver, went back to using my old Norelco I thought was worn out!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this one and stuck with it for 2 month's thinking I needed to get used to it..Its terrible. Uncomfortable to use and gives a bad shave. Went back to using my 7 year old model, what a shame, and at $138 I expected much , much more. Will never buy another. Whoever decided to change design and quality, you have done this old company a great disservice . Feels and performs like a $20 unit
customer_reviews.author: wjc

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: IMO Cheap cheap cheap ... Cheap blades... Cheap motor... LOW power... Not your fathers Norelco... Not your Norelco... I bought a new razor rather than new blades hoping to do better and totally disappointed... I called the company at one point to discuss the issue and had a female exec explaining to me HOW to shave!!! Nice try Madam... My father had “the talk” with me... He used an electric razor most of his life... I’ve been using one since I was 15... I’m a grown man I switched to Braun at one point but Felt like it was rattling my teeth IMO Like a battery “bell & howell”
customer_reviews.author: Worker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I believe I've used Norelco razors as long as I've been shaving (40+ years). I bought this razor July 17th, 2018 and was originally very happy with it. Recently though it had essentially stopped removing the whiskers. Tried repeated cleanings and the motor was fine so my only conclusion was that the blades needed to be replaced. Looking through some of the other reviews I see that this has happened to others. The official replacements (SH90) run in the $50 range. Meaning that the razor cost $150 and will need another $50 investment approximately every 6 months?? After all these years I am now looking to switch brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Just not CUTTING it
customer_reviews.text: I received this shaver about 2months ago and I used it about 2 or 3 times already I feel like it gets a okay shave on my cheeks and side burns but the "edge" performance sucks I still have to go back and use my razor to hit a couple miss spots because the shaver can't get the edge under my chin and jaw line. I tried to give it a couple chances but it's just not what it said a to be it's okay just not enough if you don't use a razor after your definitely going to have some hair spots.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio r.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The system won’t allow me to rate this razor any lower than a 1 Star. The head on this brand new razor does not provide an effective shave. The razor does not cut clean, nor do the blades last the way I would expect any other blades. These razor isn’t even four months old and I’m having to go buy a new razor. I can’t find replacement blades in any other style. I have always had a Norelco Electric shaver, but will not buy another one as long as it takes these types of blades. Highly frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as old Norelco
customer_reviews.text: I have had this shaver for a while, and does not do nearly as good as the old Norelco that it replaced. Very hard to get a close shave so that is a disappointment. Battery last good and fast charge but shave quality is not so good.
customer_reviews.author: shorty

customer_reviews.title: $150 Shaver That Does Not Come With a Stand?
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the one button only, simple razor, without all the extras. I think this is a very good razor for that purpose. But after spending $150, it just lays on the basin? My $65 senso-touch this razor replaced came with a stand. I am a bit disappointed. It did come with a travel case - that I will rarely use if ever. Much rather have had a stand. I was also interested in the S6810, which does come with a stand incidentally; just too many buttons.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good razor; takes a little getting used to.
customer_reviews.text: Actually I returned this shaver without opening the package. The price at Costco was $50 cheaper for a model that appeared to be a step up from Amazon’s product. The Philips Norelco model 9200 does a very good job in shaving my face including trimming my beard. It is a very simple process for switching out the razor for the beard trimmer accessory. But I encourage you to be careful in swapping out the razor head when utilizing the beard trimmer and then reversing the process. Surprisingly, this system does not include a cleaning brush. Cleaning the Philips Norelco is a bit cumbersome. Again, be careful in the interchange of the trimmer and the razor for cleaning purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlight

customer_reviews.title: Update to Died after4 months
customer_reviews.text: Owned 2 other models before a 5100 series and a 7000 series. the oldest one was good for many years 3+. 2nd one only for just over a year. This one died at 4 months. Product quality is getting worse but price keeps going up. Will not take a charge, will not turn on. Manufacturer is going to send out new one Also on previous 7000 series as it was under 2 yrs. Good Customer service and guarantee
customer_reviews.author: GY

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Thought paying over $100 would get something but this thing failed miserably. Entirety is plastic including the gears to drive the heads. Tiny. Simply could not even give an acceptable shave once a day for me. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: SGM Cottrell, K

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using electric shavers for a couple of decades. I had Norelco before and I liked them. My last one was a cheap brand that only lasted 2 months. I hesitated about buying this one because of the price. I read a lot of great reviews and it looked very well made. I bought it and it is the best shaver I owned. I have thick facial hair and it will burn through it. I have gone 10 days without shaving. Didn't trim first and this shaver beat down quick. Very impressed with it. A little pricey but WELL worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: boaalan

customer_reviews.title: Stunned with how Norelco keeps making these shavers better from each generation to the next
customer_reviews.text: Stunned with how Norelco keeps making these shavers better from each generation to the next. This 8900 shaves incredibly close and is smooth and gentle. Amended review. Although this is an excellent shaver after using it for months I find that the placement of the on/off button is ergonomically incorrect. Note that I use this razor for not only my face, but to shave my head as well. When holding the razor one's hand rests naturally on the power button and inadvertently shuts the razor off mid shave because just a slight touch activates the button.
customer_reviews.author: Ess Are

customer_reviews.title: Wont last if its for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for less than year and the blades barely spin anymore, no matter the charge. Should have bought my son a Braun, they last and last.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: UNDER-POWERED
customer_reviews.text: OWNED AN AMAZING TRIPLE HEAD A FEW DECADES AGO. PLENTY OF POWER, CUT YOUR BEARD QUICKLY. THIS TRIPLE HEAD IS VERY VERY UNDER-POWERED. AFTER 15 MINUTES OF SHAVING STILL NOT A CLOSE SHAVE BUT NUMEROUS WHISKER PLUCKS AND RAZOR BURN. I AM RETURNING TODAY AFTER TWO WEEKS WITH SEVERAL ATTEMPTS TO GET A GOOD SHAVE. I WOULD PAY TWICE THE PRICE FOR A NORELCO TRIPLE HEAD MADE 30 YEARS AGO IN THE USA WITH QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: CP in SRQ

customer_reviews.title: I decided to pay more for a product thinking I would get better quality. I took for ever to shave my ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking I could shave my head with it. I decided to pay more for a product thinking I would get better quality. I took for ever to shave my head and it never felt smooth so I just stopped doing it. I was going to just use it as a beard trimmer but even that couldnt keep up. It pulls hair if you don't go super slow. The only thing I liked about it was that you can use it in the shower. I bought a Panasonic Milano for a third of the price and it works way better on my beard. I just wish I could find something for my head now.
customer_reviews.author: carlmnz

customer_reviews.title: Quality = a good shaver
customer_reviews.text: This shaver was the most expensive you can buy Philips Norelco. I bought the same shaver 20 years ago, shaving daily never changed the blades. So I decided to buy a new one since the shaver was of quality. So to my surprise the new shaver didn’t cut my beard as my 20year old shaver does with 20y blades. I’m back to my old shaver. This shaver has went back in time for quality, what happened it’s not a 108.00 shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Sold as new,
customer_reviews.text: but when I took the beard trimmer apart there was shaving cream inside. I do not use shaving cream and never have. There was an additional trimmer attachment that is not listed on the accessory list, is in a different style from the rest of the shaver, and cannot be attached anywhere. So, I assume that I was sold a return as “new”. Because I have a Norelco beard and mustache trimmer, I have never actually used the beard trimmer that came with this shaver. I took the blade off the trimmer to see how to attach the extra, narrower, trimmer blade. The additional trimmer head does not fit nor can it be attached. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert van Neyhof

customer_reviews.title: Best Norelco, I have owned to date for a close shave.
customer_reviews.text: Due to many reviews about the cleaning system I bought the model S8950/91 Razor w/case only. I have been using Norelco shavers since 1970, I am 65 years old. The only thing I thought was odd is that the razor did not come with a blade cover to protect the blades as has always been the case on previous Norelco's, I guess they figured the case was sufficient. The razor is slightly louder than previous models I have owned but it also delivers the closet shave I have ever had from any previous Norelco. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this razor hoping that the technology of rotating head shavers had improved since I last had one about 20 years ago. Unfortunately I found it hasn't. If you have a thick beard like me, then the rotating heads just get bogged down and don't provide a clean cut. After a weekend of letting my stubble grow, I would have to pass over the same places three times and still had random missed hairs. I had to pull out my 7 year old Panasonic foil shaver to finish the job. I am going back to the Panasonic foil shaver style because it has a stronger motor and the foil shavers actually cut my thicker stubble.
customer_reviews.author: WildinOregon

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good razor, not a great razor. Won't get as close as a blade and sometimes frustratingly leaves strays. For the price it is worth the money. I would make sure to get some good pre-shave lotion. The lectric shave with tea tree oils is good. Obviously don't go more than 2 days without shaving and expect miracles with this. It is at its best with every day use and thorough cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs Are Great

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, worst shaver ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap shaver that takes forever to get a not so close shave. I find myself shaving more often and going back over my face numerous times and still not getting a smooth surface. Also getting ingrown hairs in multiple places, wish I could return it because it’s garbage!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Norelcos for about 40 years, and have been very satisfied. BUT this razor is the worst ever. They have gotten too cute with design and expensive heads, which in themselves are a pain to clean, and big cutters will not reach and cut whiskers under or close to the nose. I use a 20 year old Norelco or different instrument for that. Wish I could find a battery for the 20 year old one!! New one would make a huge noise meeting the cognac bottle in the trash!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to use, for a comfortable and effortless close shave!
customer_reviews.text: This electric shaver gives me a nice, effortless and close shave. The heads glide easily over my skin with minimum of chafing, and they expertly follow the contours of my face and head. I find it works best wet - especially on the tough whiskers low on my neck, but I use it dry for a quick touch up now and then. It charges in a few hours and I can get a lot of shaves out of a single charge. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: E. Talerico

customer_reviews.title: Best tripple header ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Without question this is the best Norelco three header I have ever used, and I have been using this brand for many, many years. The beard trimmer is fantastic. The system is easy to clean, charges last a surprisingly long time. Recharging is quick. Nothing to complain about! I'm still hooked on this brand!
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: daily shaver
customer_reviews.text: best daily shaver i have ever had, and i have used electric shavers for all my 70+ years, would like to be able to buy genuine replacement heads without being sold fakes, please be sure to differentiate between real and fake as fakes are not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what he needed!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our 25-year-old grandson. He’s thrilled with it and uses it every day. His job requires that he’s clean shaven every day, and this portable razor solved his problem. Well worth the cost because of the convenience, performance, and quality. He even can shave in the shower, which saves him lots of time as he rushes off to work. Great choice! Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Wilson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design for cleaning. The heads fall off, and it's nearly impossible to put them back properly.
customer_reviews.author: Fellini8

customer_reviews.title: Smaller motor struggles and battery life is poor. Still, it gives a great shave.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved these tri-rotor razors from Norelco. This model has a smaller motor and really struggles to get the job done. As a result,the battery life is pretty poor.I might get 4 shaves on a charge.That being said, I still love the shave it gives. I just hope my next one is more powerful with longer battery life.
customer_reviews.author: michAel

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, does what it should
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 3 years and it still works great. Battery is fine. The razor still detects the blade as being sharp. If you are looking for a close shave though just don't look at electric razors. They are hot the product you should be looking at. They do the job though. I usually don't have a shadow until the end of the day. It comes with a beard trimmer attachment which I use to keep up with my sideburns. You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bryton

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: I did return mine. Because it was making some kind of sound. But it was the first electric shaver which actually was working. I had a real close shave to cartridge razor. So i may get it again or i may go with a better version. I shaved after 3 to 4 days and it was still good. Also no red area on neck side. Its a good razor and one defective device doesn't proof anything
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I am still trying to learn how to use the unit since it is the first electric shaver I have ever used. So far I must be doing something won because getting the stubble under the chin done is not going so well. I will continue to test this unit and hope that before the 21 day trial period is up I can get this resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E

customer_reviews.title: Nice wet/dry shaver but
customer_reviews.text: ...after 7 months the blade mechanism and the orange holder will not stay in place. I only use the shaver once maybe twice a week. The blades come loose while shaving and start making noises. After taking the head off there was one retainer ring loose. . it will not stay in place. This is very frustrating and so Im disappointed. The older more expensive shaver I had was the 9000 series and after one year it needed blade replacements, well the RQ90 blade replacement was a plastic gadget >> stinks. What to do?
customer_reviews.author: RAC

customer_reviews.title: close shave
customer_reviews.text: I have had electric shavers in the past. I didn't like them. My wife bought this for me.. GREAT, wet or dry this shaver does an excellent job. I am a convert to THIS shsver. I would like to give it 5 stars, but at $149 it'd too pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money at all
customer_reviews.text: This new machine is not match to my 10 years old philips norelco shaving machine. the new one is inferior to the old one. it's harder to clean, took me 10 minutes to figure how to reinstall back the stupid orange 0-rings. few years ago when i wanted to buy a new machine I've read all over the internet a reviews telling that the new generations of shaving machines isn't a match to the old ones, and now I can see why, and I have to agree. the technology wasn't improved at all, the manufacturers just added a blowing names to the technique described how the technology works but that is all. definitely wouldn't recommend on buying these shaving machines,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the comfort of wet shaving!
customer_reviews.text: Love using it with shave cream, or in the shower with soap. Makes for a much smoother shave. I can’t say this gives me a closer shave than my 10/year old model, but it’s equal and sufficient—and much more comfortable. The trimmer attachment is nifty too.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Very easy on the hand.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable on the hand. Great shave. MUST clean every day. Battery very good.
customer_reviews.author: bunnie

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this razor! After about 3 months the motor ran so slow I could not shave with it. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Best electric shaver, however
customer_reviews.text: I have been using an electric razor for about 30 years. This by far is the best one I have ever used. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is that the blades don't last long before they dull. I got less than a year out of them and had to buy expensive replacements. Also I bought them from the vendor after hearing about a lot of counterfeit blades out there from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Give it a chance!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at first. It didn't seem to shave any better than Braun razor. But then I used it with shaving cream and it worked great, plus my face got used to the new razor and the shave seems to last longer. Now I love it. Give it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D. Landfair

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be ware - cost accountants got the better of this once fine product
customer_reviews.text: add that the product materials meantime between failure has reached the 15 seconds beyond warranty and customer service does not answer phone within stated hours AND 0.00 response to emails you have a maybe chance of being satisfied - I'm not.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Braun.
customer_reviews.text: Much preferred to Braun Electric Razor for Men / Electric Shaver, Series 3 ProSkin 3010s. Braun left noticeable stubble. My only complaint with the Norelco is ease of cleaning. It's hard to get the heads off for cleaning each time.
customer_reviews.author: WAN2

customer_reviews.title: Not a worthy product
customer_reviews.text: The product is not as per advertised. Not recommended by me as the motor is very slow and the shaving experience is very rough. It is an expensive trimmer expected better results and quality. I have a previous version which was bought in 2017 still works better than this one
customer_reviews.author: Mukul Gaikwad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing razor
customer_reviews.text: My dad has been using Norelco razors for 30 plus years. So getting him a new one was stressful because he’s very particular. He got this for Christmas and fell in love! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Did I Buy a Fake?
customer_reviews.text: Even though the box contained Registration instructions I coulnd not register the product to effect the warranty. The Barcode on the box was not a Phillips barcode, the Model Number was not listed as a Phillips product, and the numeric identifier was not accepted by Phillips and there was no way to get around the Phillips refusal. Makes me wonder if I paid a tidy sum for a fake Norelco product?
customer_reviews.author: Tom Damron

customer_reviews.title: Mehhhh
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what has happened to her but she doesn’t want to stay charged and run after a year of use. Seems to be a battery issue. I took the head off of this one and put it on my old norelco. It fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Like: A very quick
customer_reviews.text: Like: A very quick, clean shave. Dislike: A very loud, metallic sound, tinny and cheap sounding. occasionally pinches and pulls and actually hurts my face. Beginning to hesitate to put it to my face in the morning.. I must have owned 10 Norelco razors over the years and have never owned one with such low quality construction. I have always admired the build and heft of a quality Norelco product. I am extremely disappointed. In fact, this email has prompted me to call Norelco customer service tomorrow to report this deeply disappointing experience and to ask them to replace it with something more in nature with their history and reputation. Do you ever answer these questionnaires?
customer_reviews.author: Vincent F. Vacca, MD

customer_reviews.title: It fell apart and broke!!
customer_reviews.text: The first time my dad used the razor, it worked well on his face, then the head fell off and broke when he attempted to shave his ‘mustache zone,’ between his upper lip and nose. ....very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: jpa

customer_reviews.title: Mornings with a smart razor
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice smart razor if I ever owned one. First one to date. The feel of it it's as good as my old one. Feels like if I drop it the whole thing may come apart. But I guess that's what insurance is for. They now make a product to help clean this razor automatically but I just use a sink full of hot water a move the head around in it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Shaves no better than my 7 year old Norelco but can`t get a necessary part for old shaver. After using this shaver exclusively for several months as product literature advises, I am absolutely disappointed. It does all the advertised stuff, 8 way head movement, trimmer head is excellent, charges great. Only thing it will not do is give me a close shave and it takes forever to shave with it. I have recently started shaving with this junk and then finishing up with my old Norelco which only has 2 blades now or with a blade razor to get a good shave.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Brotzman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The head gets disassembled regularly (which is a hassle!), and the battery life is not impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Sina

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it....didn’t
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to give this to my dad for his birthday. I assumed by the price that it was a good shaver. My dad said it wouldn’t hold a charge. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: CindyP

customer_reviews.title: Lousy razor
customer_reviews.text: Lousy razor. Dose not cut close leaves whiskers no matter how many times you go over the area. Would not recommend buying. Price too high, blades are pathetic and very expensive do not last.
customer_reviews.author: jp2020

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My husband really like this razor, easy to use but it does miss some areas of his face. Overall a good razor.
customer_reviews.author: sandybeachaz

customer_reviews.title: Close shave and hits contours well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband after reviewing various razors. He really likes it. Says it gives him a closer shave than his old razor. He has also remarked that it works quickly and the razor head takes care of contours in his face easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nola L

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shave everytime
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this razor. He says it shaves easily and leaves him with a smooth shave. Its well worth the money and I would purchase for him again.
customer_reviews.author: Jolynn Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Norelco value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Best value and ease of use makes you the best barber in town, saving lots of money to be well groomed!
customer_reviews.author: John White

customer_reviews.title: they work !
customer_reviews.text: shaves very close , no pulling or scraping, cleans up easily. this is my fourth Norelco razor over many years, all have always worked great, this is the best so far. I would not have any other electric razor.
customer_reviews.author: anthony hargadon

customer_reviews.title: I use it every day
customer_reviews.text: I changed my old phillips electric shaver for this new one, I really love it, it gives a clean cut shave, the cleaning is easy and the battery lasts over 2 weeks with one shave a day, I really can recommend this shaver, I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: gerardoahuatzin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, quick, close shave
customer_reviews.text: I like the quick and close shave, comfortable (no cutting or shafing). Easy to clean, dry or under running water. The entire shaver is quite large, in part due to the free-moving head assembly. My least favorite part is the location of the ON/OFF button: it's *exactly* where I'd like to place my thumb while shaving. This forces an awkward holding position. What were the designers thinking??
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Lower Priced Midel May Suit You
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Norelci triple headers over last 20 years. They never wear out. I though this latest model with upgrades would be improvement, but save your Money and buy the less expensive model (unless you travel a ton and are worried about weight- this model is very light).
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have purchased it sooner
customer_reviews.text: After using my previous Norelco for 10+ years I was not looking forward to making a change. However, poor battery life forced my hand. Now I wish that I had purchased this years earlier. Great shave and love the trimmer attachment for beard grooming. Have replaced two aging tools with one great machine that has terrific battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: Good transition!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using one of Phillips' older shavers for 12 years! After it became practically unusable, I got this one, and boy do I feel I feel I've missed out on a lot!! I've always had problems shaving under my chin, even with razors, but with this shaver I'm experiencing the best shave of my life in that area!! Of course it's not flawless but still with a few times going over the hard areas of my face, I manage to get a great shave! All in all, I'm really satisfied with the product!! Phillips is surely the best brand to go with!!
customer_reviews.author: Ehsan

customer_reviews.title: A great shaver!
customer_reviews.text: A great shaver. It does an amazing job shaving my face. This is such a big upgrade over my old Norelco shaver that i had for 10 years before it broke. It is not quite a "perfect" shave but it is very darn close. For the record, get replacement heads model sh90.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shaver I have ever owned. I have used Philips razors for the past 40 plus years and this gives the best cut I have ever had. I especially like the cleaning ease in which you can clean this razor.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: very difficult to shave beard
customer_reviews.text: I have to shave my husband who has Alzheimer’s. I thought after all the reviews this shaver would be wonderful. The blades do not seem to touch the face. I understand they move in all directions but they “are floating” too much. Perhaps I am holding the shaver incorrectly but it does not begin to compare to the cheaper model 2100
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect job .
customer_reviews.text: Love this razor. Just what I wanted. Easy to use and hold. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Angie A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good shave
customer_reviews.text: The heads have a large surface area and conform to the curves comfortably. The head pops off easily so you can wash out the whiskers. A full charge lasts between 1 and 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket J S

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: My husband is enjoying his new razor. Says he’s getting a real good dry shave. It’s very face.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: I had a Braun, but it failed, so i needed another and got the same one my dad has....very happy with choice
customer_reviews.author: Spyder57

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: Great razor. Cleaning it takes a little time but is worth the effort
customer_reviews.author: Gary LaGassey

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Shaver -- don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage - stopped working after a month and no possibility to return!. piece of garbage!
customer_reviews.author: A+ Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs More Power
customer_reviews.text: This razor does not have enough power to cut my beard. Luckily, I kept my older and cheaper Norelco which works much better.
customer_reviews.author: MONTY

customer_reviews.title: Holds charge.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as my old trusty Norelco model but customer service was very helpful at sending me blades to keep me from looking unshaven.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Very good but it's not better than a older Philips Shaver that I have and paid much cheaper...easy cleaning and good battery charge.... have to go many times over the same spot for a good shaving just like my old cheap Philips shaver
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Moura

customer_reviews.title: I want a redund
customer_reviews.text: This product is the worst electric shaver I ever bought. It does not do the basic shaving I require. I need to know how I can return this product
customer_reviews.author: Carl Nagami

customer_reviews.title: Not travellor friendly but nevertheless a great shaver
customer_reviews.text: This razor is superior to others. It shaves close very close per my husband. He wishes that it had its stand and a case for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: one of the heads fell out the first week. Has problems trying to get it back in. All plastic but the saving heads. Not like the old Norelco Savers
customer_reviews.author: Roger P. Baker

customer_reviews.title: This Razor is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about how good this razor is and how convenient and useful it is to me every time I use it! The additional add-ons are really useful and work well also.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Painful shave!!
customer_reviews.text: Most painful shaver ever.. Missed return window.. Rips hairs out or misses them completely..AVOID, DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Pablo B

customer_reviews.title: Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a regular electric razor and wanted to try a rotary. I got this one and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarg

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant at first as this is the most expensive electric shaver I have ever purchased. However, this is hands down the best electric shaver I have ever used. Make sure you use the right technique and it works like a charm (hold skin tight and circular motions). Love it. The Trimmer that comes with it is pretty decent as well, added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: DSki

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Best Norelco yet. Been shaving with Norelcos for over 30 years this new on is my fifth I just love the way it shaves. Being retired I sometimes skip a day or so shaving and this baby shaves two or three day stubble as well as day old.
customer_reviews.author: *David*

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in Razor Box
customer_reviews.text: This razor was shipped in its original box and was pretty beat up when i received it. I cant believe the did not put it in another box. I have to give it as a Christmas present to my boyfriend and it looks used because of the box :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this model.
customer_reviews.text: My first Norelco was great and so I went for a second.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Carunchio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shaver
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. Gives a close and comfortable shave. No built in trimmer is the only minus that I have with it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip E. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best electric razor I've used yet. Norelco really out did themselves.
customer_reviews.author: David Zehr

customer_reviews.title: good shave
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a wet dry shaver using it wet great shave very happy I bought this
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Female user
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman who was looking for a high quality electric razor to shave my legs with (I have sensitive skin and traditional razor blades always cause irritation). This shaver did not give as close of a shave as I was expecting after reading other reviews. Also, after every couple minutes of shaving the faucet head icon would blink even after I had disassembled and thoroughly rinsed the rotary blades. I ended up returning it in favor of a cheaper foil shaver which delivered a much closer shave without irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality as always!
customer_reviews.text: It's my third Philips shaver. Great products as always! minimal damage for skin and great finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: Another great shaver. My husband is a long time fan.
customer_reviews.author: Tekla Baker

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: They don’t shave to good. I have to keep going over the same spots
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor; no cleaner (thank God)
customer_reviews.text: The razor gives a great shave. Fortunately, Phillips has this option that you can purchase the razor without the cleaning gizmo (I used it with a previous razor. It's OK, but mostly an extra unneeded expense. What I don't like is Amazon's delivery. The razor arrived with a label attached to the plastic shell-pack -- no box. I consider this unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: NGB

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Shaver Does Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice shaver. I'm getting a close shave in about 6 minutes, dipping the 8900 in hot water frequently.
customer_reviews.author: gentsonly

customer_reviews.title: low on power
customer_reviews.text: do not order this if you are looking to get a good shave it will not do this
customer_reviews.author: fuzzbear

customer_reviews.title: Product design Flaws
customer_reviews.text: The shaving head base attachment deteriorates within one year. The shaving blades fall out of their flimsy ring supports within 6 months. Both of these product design flaws make it not such a great product. Years ago, Norelco made a better product without these flaws.
customer_reviews.author: christie s

customer_reviews.title: Philips/Norelco 8900 shaver is on point.
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use and when you use the trimmer headings you have different settings. The trimmer and three brade shaver can be cleaned in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Lee

customer_reviews.title: excellent shaving experience from Norelco
customer_reviews.text: excellent shaving experience from Norelco! We made a lot of purchases on Amazon and we believe this is so far the best purchase ever. It can hit all over the place such as my lips, neck and face.
customer_reviews.author: Fresh Mint Air

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Shaves Beautifully. I don't like the method of cleaning. It must be cleaned after every use. Kind of a hassle. Requires running water. Minor gripes as it works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Cathey

customer_reviews.title: it seems to be well built and works good. it is pretty quite
customer_reviews.text: it seems to be well built and works good. it is pretty quite. the most I have ever paid for a shaver. and I have had Norelco as long as I have needed one. it doess a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wiedeman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. Terrible takes half an hour to shave. Can’t get a deep shave with it .
customer_reviews.author: Bob Yazdani

product_meta.title: Philips Norelco S8950/91 Shaver 8900 Rechargeable Wet/Dry Electric Shaver with Click-on Beard Styler Attachment, S8950/91
product_meta.description: Philips Norelco Shaver 8900 Rechargeable Wet/Dry Electric Shaver with Click-on Beard Styler Attachment, S8950/91 Product description (optional) : This wet or dry electric shaver is designed to contour to the curves of your face and cut closer to the skin. Cutting 20% more hair in a single pass and 30% closer to skin, the Shaver 8900 gives you our most advanced shave yet! Included SmartClean system cleans, lubricates, and dries the shave to keep it performing at its best. Fully washable for easier maintenance. SmartClick Beard Styler with 5 built-in length settings for trimming stubble to a short beard. Up to 50 minutes of cordless shaving per full charge Lithium-ion battery also fully charges in 1 hour. Cleaning Indicator Lights LED lights indicate when it is time to recharge your shaver. Travel lock feature helps you avoid wasting battery life.
feature_bullets: The Philips Norelco shaver 8900 is designed to contour to the curves of your face and cut closer to the skin; Experience a premium wet or dry shaving experience day after day in a convenient, cordless shaver

Unique contour detect technology follows the curves of your face to cut up to 20 percent more hair in a single pass; The V track precision blades deliver a comfortable shave that is 30 percent closer to your skin
The smart click beard styler is designed to prevent skin irritation with its rounded tips and comb and include 5 built in length settings for trimming stubble to a short beard
Shave wherever and however you'd like; Enjoy a convenient dry shave or a comfortable wet shave with gel or foam, or even in the shower
The rechargeable Lithium ion battery delivers the power of a corded shaver without the hassle of a cord; 50 minutes of shaving time, with a 3 level LED battery indicator; Automatic voltage: 100-240 V

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
